item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[featuredPanel] [columnContainer bgcolor="#303030"] [column span="span1"] [/column] [column span="span3"]
Clean and Modern
The HOPE foundation theme sports a clean modern look with a stylish design and is built on the Responsive Bootstrap framework. [hopeButton color="#ACDB05" type="small" url="/hope/columns" target="_blank"]View Columns[/hopeButton] [/column] [column span="span1"] [/column] [column span="span3"]
Fully Customizable
We build our themes to be 100% customizable through the use of clever shortcodes, widgets and custom plug-ins. [hopeButton color="#ACDB05" type="small" url="/hope/widgets" target="_blank"]View Widgets[/hopeButton] [/column] [column span="span1"] [/column] [column span="span3"]
Theme Leaders
We are committed to quality, excellence and customer support. Learn more about us at PulsarMedia.ca [hopeButton color="#ACDB05" type="small" url="http://www.pulsarmedia.ca" target="_blank"]Learn More[/hopeButton] [/column] [/columnContainer] [/featuredPanel] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="View a complete list of bootstrap configurations" link="/hope/columns" icon="fa fa-link"]Bootstrap Shortcodes[/panelHeader] Setup page layouts quick and easy with our built in bootstrap shortcodes. [/column] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="View a complete list of custom Widgets" link="/hope/widgets" icon="fa fa-cogs"]Custom Widgets[/panelHeader] Our premium themes come packed with many useful widgets right of the get-go. [/column] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="You can also add additional Google font styles." link="" icon="fa fa-google-plus"]Google Fonts[/panelHeader] Full Google Fonts library available. Select from over 600 fonts! Library updates automatically! [/column] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="FontAwesome icons rock!" link="" icon="fa fa-thumbs-up-o"]FontAwesome Icons[/panelHeader] Over 361 icons available and ready to use. Add icons anywhere in your posts or pages. [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span6"] [youtubeVideo id="TxbmjDngois" responsive="1" height="300" /] [/column] [column span="span6"]
Featured Video
Why Poverty? Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis vitae turpis ipsum. Curabitur quis sem ut lacus vulputate ornare ut vel ipsum. Suspendisse in turpis ipsum. Pellentesque scelerisque facilisis mattis. Morbi id mauris feugiat, consequat orci in, dictum orci. Mauris facilisis ante ultricies nisl ullamcorper, sed faucibus metus ullamcorper. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis vitae turpis ipsum. Curabitur quis sem ut lacus vulputate ornare ut vel ipsum. [hopeButton type="small" textcolor="white" color="#0FB7C2" url="/hope/videos/"]Watch More[/hopeButton] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer] [column span="span4"] [singlePost id="93" /] [/column] [column span="span4"] [singlePost id="104" /] [/column] [column span="span4"] [singlePost id="107" /] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer fullscreen="on" bgimage="http://wp.microthemes.ca/hope/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/kids-bg.jpg"] [column span="span12"]   [callToAction]Create Clean Unique Layouts[/callToAction] Customize this modern theme any way you want with endless combinations of our powerful shortcodes. Our Premium themes are easy to work with! [hopeButton type="large" color="#ACDB05" url="/hope/panels/"]See More Features[/hopeButton] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer] [column span="span12" alignment="center"]
We need your help to reach our goal of $10,000. Help make a donation today!
[progressBar percentage="60%" /] [hopeButton type="small" color="#0FB7C2" url="/hope/donations/" textcolor="#FFFFFF"]Make a Donation[/hopeButton] [/column] [/columnContainer]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: HOPE is a premium non-profit charity WordPress Theme available for purchase at ThemeForest.net

item.title: Columns
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span12"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-align-right" link="" tip="test"]Bootstrap Columns[/panelHeader] This page displays Bootstrap Column layout examples. For demonstration purposes all shortcodes are being displayed in round brackets. To execute any of these shortcodes you must replace the round brackets with square brackets. These column shortcodes also accept an alignment parameter which allows a column to display its content to the left, centered or to the right (see examples below). [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span3"]
Span3 column
(column span="span1")(/column)
[/column] [column span="span4"]
Span4 column
(column span="span4")(/column)
[/column] [column span="span5"]
Span5 column
(column span="span5")(/column)
[/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span6"]
Span6 column
(column span="span6")(/column)
[/column] [column span="span6"]
Span6 column
(column span="span6")(/column)
[/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span7"]

[/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span8"]

[/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span9"]

[/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span10"]

[/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span11"]

[/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer] [column span="span12"]

item.title: Buttons
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span12"] This page displays Button Shortcode examples. Button shortcodes accept the following parameters:
  • color - Available colors (blue, red, green, purple, orange, grey, brown, black, yellow, pink, teal)
  • textColor - Enter a hexadecimal value (ex. #FFFFFF)
  • type - Available types (small, medium, large)
  • url - Pass in a URL value (ex. "http://www.google.com")
  • target - Choose whether a button opens in a new window or not ("_blank" or "_self")
Note: parameters must be wrapped quotations. [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer] [column span="span12"]
Small Button
(hopeButton type="small" color="blue" textColor="#FFFFFF" url="http://www.google.com" target="_blank")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="blue" textColor="#FFFFFF" url="http://www.google.com" target="_blank"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="purple" textColor="white")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="purple" textColor="white"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="green" textColor="black")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="green" textColor="black"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="orange" textColor="black")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="orange" textColor="black"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="grey" textColor="white")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="grey" textColor="white"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="black" textColor="white")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="black" textColor="white"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="yellow" textColor="black")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="yellow" textColor="black"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="pink" textColor="black")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="pink" textColor="black"]Small Button[/hopeButton] (hopeButton type="small" color="teal" textColor="black")Small Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="small" color="teal" textColor="black"]Small Button[/hopeButton]
Medium Button
(hopeButton type="medium" color="red" textColor="#FFFFFF" url="http://www.google.com" target="_blank")Medium Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="medium" color="red" textColor="#FFFFFF" url="http://www.google.com" target="_blank"]Medium Button[/hopeButton]
Large Button
(hopeButton type="large" color="purple" textColor="#FFFFFF" url="http://www.google.com" target="_blank")Large Button(/hopeButton) [hopeButton type="large" color="purple" textColor="#FFFFFF" url="http://www.google.com" target="_blank"]Large Button[/hopeButton] [/column] [/columnContainer]

item.title: Videos
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span12"] This page display's the Video Shortcodes available for this theme. You can insert Youtube or Vimeo videos anywhere inside posts, pages or widgets. The Youtube and Vimeo both accept the same following parameters:
  • id (supply a video id)
  • width
  • height
  • responsive (set to 1 to make the video responsive)
[/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span12"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-video-camera"]YouTube (Fixed width)[/panelHeader] (youtubeVideo id="TxbmjDngois" width="400" height="350")(/youtubeVideo) [youtubeVideo id="TxbmjDngois" width="400" height="350"][/youtubeVideo] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span12"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-video-camera"]YouTube (Responsive)[/panelHeader] (youtubeVideo id="TxbmjDngois" height="350" responsive="1")(/youtubeVideo) [youtubeVideo id="TxbmjDngois" height="350" responsive="1"][/youtubeVideo] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span12"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-video-camera"]Vimeo (Fixed width)[/panelHeader] (vimeoVideo id="72625185" width="400" height="350")(/vimeoVideo) [vimeoVideo id="72625185" width="400" height="350"][/vimeoVideo] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer] [column span="span12"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-video-camera"]Vimeo (Responsive)[/panelHeader] (vimeoVideo id="72625185" height="350" responsive="1")(/vimeoVideo) [vimeoVideo id="72625185" height="350" responsive="1"][/vimeoVideo] [/column] [/columnContainer]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Add Youtube or Vimeo videos anywhere inside posts, pages or widgets
Add Youtube or Vimeo videos anywhere inside posts, pages or widgets

item.title: Alerts
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded: [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span12"] This page displays Alert Shortcode examples. The alert shortcodes accepts the close parameter with a value of true or false. Passing in a value of false will prevent the alert box from being closed (see the Danger Box example below). [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span6"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-warning"]Danger Box[/panelHeader] (alert close="true" type="danger")This is an Alert Danger box.(/alert) [alert close="true" type="danger"]This is an Alert Danger box.[/alert] [/column] [column span="span6"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-info"]Info Box[/panelHeader] (alert close="true" type="info")This is an Info box.(/alert) [alert close="true" type="info"]This is an Alert Info box.[/alert] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer] [column span="span6"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-thumbs-up"]Success Box[/panelHeader] (alert close="true" type="success")This is a Success box.(/alert) [alert close="true" type="success"]This is an Alert Success box.[/alert] [/column] [column span="span6"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-adn"]Alert Box[/panelHeader] (alert close="true" type="alert")This is an Alert box.(/alert) [alert close="true" type="alert"]This is an Alert box.[/alert] [/column] [/columnContainer]

item.title: Social Icons
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[columnContainer] [column span="span12"] This page displays the Social Media Shortcode example. This shortcode accepts any FontAwesome icon value - see a list of available icons here. To add social icons simply create a socialGroup container first followed by any amount of socialIcon shortcodes. Here is a full list of parameters for the socialIcon shortcode:
  • icon
  • size
  • color
  • link
  • target
(socialGroup) (socialIcon icon="facebook" size="10" color="#3C599B" link="http://www.facebook.com" target="_self")(/socialIcon) (socialIcon icon="twitter" size="10" color="#32CCFE" link="http://www.twitter.com" target="_blank")(/socialIcon) (socialIcon icon="dribbble" size="10" color="#D95232" link="http://www.dribbble.com" )(/socialIcon) (socialIcon icon="tumblr" size="10" color="#1D87BD" link="http://www.tumblr.com" )(/socialIcon) (socialIcon icon="android" size="10" color="#009DF7" link="http://www.android.com" )(/socialIcon) (/socialGroup) [socialGroup] [socialIcon icon="fa fa-facebook" size="10" color="#3C599B" link="http://www.facebook.com" target="_self"][/socialIcon] [socialIcon icon="fa fa-twitter" size="10" color="#32CCFE" link="http://www.twitter.com" target="_blank"][/socialIcon] [socialIcon icon="fa fa-dribbble" size="10" color="#D95232" link="http://www.dribbble.com"][/socialIcon] [socialIcon icon="fa fa-tumblr" size="10" color="#1D87BD" link="http://www.tumblr.com"][/socialIcon] [socialIcon icon="fa fa-android" size="10" color="#009DF7" link="http://www.android.com"][/socialIcon] [/socialGroup] [/column] [/columnContainer]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Add social icons anywhere inside posts, pages or widgets
Add social icons anywhere inside posts, pages or widgets

item.title: Widgets
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded: [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span4"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-twitter"]Twitter Widget[/panelHeader] Add a Twitter feed to sidebar columns or footer columns. [/column] [column span="span4"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-facebook"]Facebook Widget[/panelHeader] Add a Facebook Like box to sidebar columns or footer columns. [/column] [column span="span4"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-flickr"]Flickr Widget[/panelHeader] Add a live Flickr feed to sidebar columns or footer columns. [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span4"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-video-camera"]Video Widget[/panelHeader] Add popular Youtube, Vimeo or Dailymotion videos in sidebar columns or footer columns. [/column] [column span="span4"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-mail-reply"]Mailchimp Widget[/panelHeader] Add a MailChimp powered newsletter sign-up form in sidebar columns or footer columns. [/column] [column span="span4"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-envelope"]Quick Contact Widget[/panelHeader] Add a Quick Contact form in sidebar columns or footer columns. [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer] [column span="span4"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-calendar"]Events Widget[/panelHeader] Post upcoming events in sidebar columns or footer columns. [/column] [column span="span4"] [panelHeader icon="fa fa-thumb-tack"]Recent Posts Widget[/panelHeader] Add stylized Recent Posts in sidebar columns or footer columns. [/column] [/columnContainer]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: We have you covered with our extensive library of custom widgets!
We have you covered with our extensive library of custom widgets!

item.title: Help Tabs
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded: [columnContainer] [column span="span12"] This premium WordPress themes comes with built-in help tabs in the administration system making it easy to copy and paste shortcodes on the fly. The Help tab can be located in the top right hand corner of the WordPress administration system. [/column] [/columnContainer]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Built in help tabs for quick and easy access to shortcodes
Built in help tabs for quick and easy access to shortcodes

item.title: Custom Post Types
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[columnContainer]
[column span="span4"]
[panelHeader icon="fa fa-calendar" link="/hope/events" tip="View the Events page"]Event System[/panelHeader]
Add and manage events through Events Custom Post Type. The events custom post type also comes equipped with a widget for easily adding events anywhere inside sidebars.
[/column]
[column span="span4"]
[panelHeader icon="fa fa-picture-o" link="/hope/gallery-page/children-aid-charity-event/" tip="View the Gallery page"]Gallery System[/panelHeader]
Add unlimited photo/video galleries through the Gallery Custom Post Type. Upload photos with thumbnails, add image captions and add Youtube videos.
[/column]
[column span="span4"]
[panelHeader icon="fa fa-user" link="/hope/organizers/" tip="View the Organizers page"]Organizers[/panelHeader]
Add organizer profiles quick and easy through the Organizer Custom Post Type. Each profile can be configured with personal and social information for easy access to contact information.
[/column]
[/columnContainer]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Manage content easier with custom post types
Manage content easier with custom post types
All the latest news from around the globe and more.
All the latest news from around the globe and more.

item.title: Blog
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded: Use this static Page to test the Theme's handling of the Blog Posts Index page. If the site is set to display a static Page on the Front Page, and this Page is set to display the Blog Posts Index, then this text should not appear.

item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[featuredPanel] [columnContainer bgcolor="#303030"] [column span="span1"] [/column] [column span="span3"]
Pulito e moderno
La fondazione tema HOPE sfoggia un look pulito e moderno, con un design elegante ed è costruito sul framework Bootstrap Responsive. [hopeButton color="#ACDB05" type="small" url="/hope/columns" target="_blank"]View Columns[/hopeButton] [/column] [column span="span1"] [/column] [column span="span3"]
Completamente personalizzabile
Costruiamo i nostri temi di essere al 100% personalizzabile attraverso l'uso di codici brevi intelligenti, widget e personalizzato plug-in. [hopeButton color="#ACDB05" type="small" url="/hope/widgets" target="_blank"]View Widgets[/hopeButton] [/column] [column span="span1"] [/column] [column span="span3"]
Leader a tema
Siamo impegnati a qualità, l'eccellenza e assistenza clienti. Scopri di più su noi PulsarMedia.ca [hopeButton color="#ACDB05" type="small" url="http://www.pulsarmedia.ca" target="_blank"]Learn More[/hopeButton] [/column] [/columnContainer] [/featuredPanel] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="View a complete list of bootstrap configurations" link="/hope/columns" icon="icon-link"]Bootstrap Shortcodes[/panelHeader] Layout di pagina Installazione facile e veloce con il nostro costruito in codici brevi bootstrap. [/column] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="View a complete list of custom Widgets" link="/hope/widgets" icon="icon-cogs"]Custom Widgets[/panelHeader] I nostri temi premium sono confezionati con molti widget utili destra del get-go. [/column] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="You can also add additional Google font styles." link="" icon="icon-google-plus"]Google Fonts[/panelHeader] Pieno biblioteca Google Fonts disponibili. Scegli tra più di 600 caratteri! Aggiornamenti Biblioteca automaticamente! [/column] [column span="span3"] [panelHeader tip="FontAwesome icons rock!" link="" icon="icon-thumbs-up-alt"]FontAwesome Icons[/panelHeader] Oltre 361 icone disponibili e pronti per l'uso. Aggiungere icone ovunque nei tuoi post o pagine. [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer border="yes"] [column span="span6"] [youtubeVideo id="TxbmjDngois" responsive="1" height="300" /] [/column] [column span="span6"]
Featured Video
Why Poverty? Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis vitae turpis ipsum. Curabitur quis sem ut lacus vulputate ornare ut vel ipsum. Suspendisse in turpis ipsum. Pellentesque scelerisque facilisis mattis. Morbi id mauris feugiat, consequat orci in, dictum orci. Mauris facilisis ante ultricies nisl ullamcorper, sed faucibus metus ullamcorper. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis vitae turpis ipsum. Curabitur quis sem ut lacus vulputate ornare ut vel ipsum. [hopeButton type="small" textcolor="white" color="#0FB7C2" url="/hope/videos/"]Watch More[/hopeButton] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer] [column span="span4"] [singlePost id="93" /] [/column] [column span="span4"] [singlePost id="104" /] [/column] [column span="span4"] [singlePost id="107" /] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer fullscreen="on" bgimage="http://wp.microthemes.ca/hope/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/kids-bg.jpg"] [column span="span12"]   [callToAction]Crea Clean unici layout[/callToAction] Personalizza questo tema moderno qualsiasi modo si desidera con infinita combinazioni dei nostri potenti codici brevi. I temi Premium sono facili da lavorare! [hopeButton type="large" color="#ACDB05" url="/hope/panels/"]Vedi altre caratteristiche[/hopeButton] [/column] [/columnContainer] [columnContainer] [column span="span12" alignment="center"]
Abbiamo bisogno del vostro aiuto per raggiungere il nostro obiettivo di $ 10.000. Contribuire a rendere una donazione oggi!
[progressBar percentage="60%" /] [hopeButton type="small" color="blue" url="/hope/donations/" textcolor="#FFFFFF"]Make a Donation[/hopeButton] [/column] [/columnContainer]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: All proceeds will be donated to the HOPE Charity Foundation.

item.title: Homepage VC
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1462570175083{background-color: #303030 !important;}" el_class="pm-containerPadding-top-20 pm-containerPadding-bottom-60"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][pm_ln_feature_box title="Clean and Modern" button_text="View Shortcodes" button_url="/hope/shortcodes" icon_image="71"]

The HOPE foundation theme sports a clean modern look with a stylish design and is built on the Responsive Bootstrap framework.

[/pm_ln_feature_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][pm_ln_feature_box title="Customizable Features" button_text="View Widgets" button_url="/hope/widgets" icon_image="72"]

We build our themes to be customizable through the use of custom shortcodes, theme options and customizer settings.

[/pm_ln_feature_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][pm_ln_feature_box title="Theme Leaders" button_text="Learn More" button_url="https://www.microthemes.ca" btn_color="#acdb05" icon_image="73"]

We are committed to quality, excellence and customer support. Have a question? Try our live chat at MicroThemes.ca

[/pm_ln_feature_box][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-top-60"][vc_column width="1/4"][pm_ln_panel_header message="Visual Composer Shortcodes" tip="View our shortcodes" icon="fa fa-link" link="/hope/shortcodes" bgcolor="#00b7c2" margin_top="10" margin_bottom="10"][vc_column_text]Setup page layouts quick and easy with our built in bootstrap shortcodes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][pm_ln_panel_header message="Custom Widgets" tip="View our widgets" icon="fa fa-cogs" link="/hope/widgets" bgcolor="#00b7c2" margin_top="10" margin_bottom="10"][vc_column_text]Our premium themes come packed with many useful widgets right of the get-go.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][pm_ln_panel_header message="Google Fonts" tip="Runs on Redux Framework" icon="fa fa-google-plus" link="https://www.microthemes.ca/premium-wordpress-themes/hope-charity-wordpress-theme/" target="_blank" bgcolor="#00b7c2" margin_top="10" margin_bottom="10"][vc_column_text]With the Redux Framework you get access to the entire Google Fonts library.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][pm_ln_panel_header message="FontAwesome 4 Icons" tip="FontAwesome icons rock!" icon="fa fa-thumbs-up" link="https://www.microthemes.ca/premium-wordpress-themes/hope-charity-wordpress-theme/" target="_blank" bgcolor="#00b7c2" margin_top="10" margin_bottom="10"][vc_column_text]Over 361 icons available and ready to use. Add icons anywhere in your posts or pages.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][pm_ln_content_divider bg_color="#00b7c2" margin_top="50" margin_bottom="50"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][pm_ln_youtube_video el_width="300" el_height="300" el_video_id="TxbmjDngois"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Featured Video

Why Poverty?

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis vitae turpis ipsum. Curabitur quis sem ut lacus vulputate ornare ut vel ipsum. Suspendisse in turpis ipsum. Pellentesque scelerisque facilisis mattis. Morbi id mauris feugiat, consequat orci in, dictum orci. Mauris facilisis ante ultricies nisl ullamcorper, sed faucibus metus ullamcorper. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis vitae turpis ipsum. Curabitur quis sem ut lacus vulputate ornare ut vel ipsum.[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_standard_button btn_text="Watch More" margin="10" color="#acdb05" textcolor="#3d3d3d" link="/hope/shortcodes/"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][pm_ln_content_divider bg_color="#00b7c2" margin_top="50" margin_bottom="50"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-bottom-60"][vc_column][pm_ln_post_items num_of_posts="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" parallax="content-moving" parallax_image="89" el_class="pm-containerPadding-top-10 pm-containerPadding-bottom-30"][vc_column][vc_row_inner el_class="cta_container"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Visual Composer Ready!

[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_content_divider height="3" width="50" bg_color="#acdb05" margin_top="20" margin_bottom="20"][vc_column_text]

All custom shortcodes are integrated directly into Visual Composer making it super easy to create pages via drag n drop with powerful interactive elements designed for the Hope Charity Theme.

At Micro Themes we make it easy to work with our themes [/vc_column_text][pm_ln_standard_button btn_text="See More Features" url="/hope/shortcodes" margin="20" color="#acdb05" textcolor="#3d3d3d" type="large" link="/hope/shortcodes"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][pm_ln_youtube_video el_width="300" el_height="350" el_video_id="Tb1HsAGy-ls"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-top-60 pm-containerPadding-bottom-60"][vc_column][vc_column_text]
We need your help to reach our goal of $10,000. Help make a donation today!
[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_progress_bar percentage="60"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][pm_ln_sponsors_carousel][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Homepage VC French
item.dc:creator: micro_themes
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1462570175083{background-color: #303030 !important;}" el_class="pm-containerPadding-top-20 pm-containerPadding-bottom-60"][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][pm_ln_feature_box title=" Propre et moderne" button_text="Afficher les codes courts" button_url="/hope/shortcodes" btn_color="#acdb05" icon_image="71"]

Le thème de la fondation HOPE arbore un look moderne et propre avec un design élégant et est construit sur le cadre de Bootstrap Responsive.

[/pm_ln_feature_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][pm_ln_feature_box title="Caractéristiques personnalisables" button_text="Afficher les widgets" button_url="/hope/widgets" btn_color="#acdb05" icon_image="72"]

Nous construisons nos thèmes pour être personnalisables en utilisant des shortcodes personnalisés, des options de thème et des paramètres de personnalisation.

[/pm_ln_feature_box][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][pm_ln_feature_box title=" Responsables du thème" button_text="Apprendre encore plus" button_url="https://www.microthemes.ca" btn_color="#acdb05" icon_image="73"]

Nous sommes engagés à la qualité, l'excellence et le soutien à la clientèle. Avoir une question? Essayez notre chat en direct à MicroThemes.ca

[/pm_ln_feature_box][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-top-60"][vc_column width="1/4"][pm_ln_panel_header message="Visual Composer Shortcodes" tip=" Voir nos codes courts" icon="fa fa-link" link="/hope/shortcodes" bgcolor="#00b7c2" margin_top="10" margin_bottom="10"][vc_column_text]Paramétrage des mises en page rapides et faciles avec nos raccourcis intégrés bootstrap.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][pm_ln_panel_header message="Widgets personnalisés" tip="Voir nos widgets" icon="fa fa-cogs" link="/hope/widgets" bgcolor="#00b7c2" margin_top="10" margin_bottom="10"][vc_column_text]Nos thèmes premium sont livrés avec de nombreux widgets utiles à droite de l'aller-aller.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][pm_ln_panel_header message="Google Fonts" tip="Fonctionne sur Redux Framework" icon="fa fa-google-plus" link="https://www.microthemes.ca/premium-wordpress-themes/hope-charity-wordpress-theme/" target="_blank" bgcolor="#00b7c2" margin_top="10" margin_bottom="10"][vc_column_text]Avec Redux Framework, vous avez accès à toute la bibliothèque Google Fonts.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][pm_ln_panel_header message="FontAwesome 4 Icons" tip="Les icônes FontAwesome rock!" icon="fa fa-thumbs-up" link="https://www.microthemes.ca/premium-wordpress-themes/hope-charity-wordpress-theme/" target="_blank" bgcolor="#00b7c2" margin_top="10" margin_bottom="10"][vc_column_text]Plus de 361 icônes disponibles et prêtes à l'emploi. Ajoutez des icônes n'importe où dans vos messages ou vos pages.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][pm_ln_content_divider bg_color="#00b7c2" margin_top="50" margin_bottom="50"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][pm_ln_youtube_video el_width="300" el_height="300" el_video_id="TxbmjDngois"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Vidéo en vedette

Pourquoi la pauvreté?

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis vitae turpis ipsum. Curabitur quis sem ut lacus vulputate ornare ut vel ipsum. Suspendisse in turpis ipsum. Pellentesque scelerisque facilisis mattis. Morbi id mauris feugiat, consequat orci in, dictum orci. Mauris facilisis ante ultricies nisl ullamcorper, sed faucibus metus ullamcorper. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis vitae turpis ipsum. Curabitur quis sem ut lacus vulputate ornare ut vel ipsum.[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_standard_button btn_text="Watch More" link="/hope/shortcodes/" margin="10" color="#acdb05" textcolor="#3d3d3d"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][pm_ln_content_divider bg_color="#00b7c2" margin_top="50" margin_bottom="50"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-bottom-60"][vc_column][pm_ln_post_items num_of_posts="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" parallax="content-moving" parallax_image="89" el_class="pm-containerPadding-top-70 pm-containerPadding-bottom-30"][vc_column][vc_row_inner el_class="cta_container"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Visual Composer Ready!

[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_content_divider height="3" width="50" bg_color="#acdb05" margin_top="20" margin_bottom="20"][vc_column_text]

Tous les shortcodes personnalisés sont intégrés directement dans Visual Composer, ce qui rend super facile de créer des pages via drag n drop avec des éléments interactifs puissants conçus pour le thème Hope Charity.

Chez Micro Themes, nous facilitons le travail avec nos thèmes.[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_standard_button btn_text="Voir plus de fonctionnalités" link="/hope/shortcodes" margin="20" color="#acdb05" textcolor="#3d3d3d" type="large"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][pm_ln_youtube_video el_width="300" el_height="350" el_video_id="Tb1HsAGy-ls"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-top-60 pm-containerPadding-bottom-60"][vc_column][vc_column_text]
Nous avons besoin de votre aide pour atteindre notre objectif de 10 000 $. Aidez à faire un don aujourd'hui!
[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_progress_bar percentage="60"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][pm_ln_sponsors_carousel][/vc_column][/vc_row]
